arts.ttl: Chris Davies reveals what was said in Steve Evans and Taylor Gardner-Hickman fracas
arts.sum: Chris Davies won’t dwell on his disagreement with Steve Evans after the Rotherham manager took umbrage with Taylor Gardner-Hickman after Birmingham City’s win over the Millers. Once Evans had finished his disagreement with Davies, he confronted Blues midfielder Gardner-Hickman, who won the decisive penalty with a slalom through midfield before being tripped by Hakeem Odoffin in the box.

arts.ttl: Three players who could leave Birmingham City before transfer window closes
arts.sum: Grant Hanley and Kieran Dowell have arrived to see Blues over the line in their League One promotion race and Davies’ priority is to sign a new left-back before the window closes on Monday night. Davies says Dowell can play as an inverted right-winger, like he did at Norwich, so he’s all of a sudden in that conversation.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City player ratings after Jay Stansfield completes comeback over Rotherham
arts.sum: The first was created by Keshi Anderson down the left and lashed goalwards by Stansfield, who turned smartly inside the box to work a yard of space, but Phillips positioned a strong right arm correctly to keep it out. Stansfield cancelled out Sam Nombe’s opener nine minutes after half-time before notching an 81st minute penalty to secure another home win for Blues.

arts.ttl: Jay Stansfield at the double as Birmingham hit back to beat Rotherham
arts.sum: Sam Nombe had given the Millers the lead.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies explains why he’s ‘taken the shine’ off Birmingham City record buy Jay Stansfield
arts.sum: And yet, those who watched Stansfield excel in the Championship last season know that there’s more to come from the 22-year-old. League One was never going to be easy for Jay Stansfield from the moment he re-signed for Birmingham City.

arts.ttl: Saturday's League One predictions including Birmingham City vs. Rotherham United
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Birmingham City vs. Rotherham United.

arts.ttl: Wrexham complete transfer for ex-England international striker as they chase Birmingham City
arts.sum: Birmingham City's promotion rivals Wrexham have made a big move in the transfer market by signing former England and Premier League striker Jay Rodriguez. He won promotion to the Premier League again in 2023 and arrives at Wrexham having made more than 550 appearances across his career, scoring 148 goals.

arts.ttl: Steve Evans makes two predictions and reveals what League One managers think of Birmingham City
arts.sum: Steve Evans has ditched the ‘Galacticos of League One’ and ‘Real Birmingham' jibes this time around to hail the Birmingham City squad Chris Davies has assembled. With that in mind, Evans views this weekend’s game as a free hit for Rotherham, and that seems to be the general consensus among League One’s managers.

arts.ttl: 'Amazing': Ben Davies says Spurs have a brilliant youngster who's 'worked so hard' to get to where he is now
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur may have had their fair share of issues this season but Thursday night shone a light on the bright future in store at...

arts.ttl: Preview: Birmingham City vs. Rotherham United - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Birmingham City and Rotherham United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
